title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 331.12 - Committees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 331.12 - Committees

State Regulations

The senate may establish such standing committees as it
deems advisable and shall prescribe the functions of such committees. One such
committee shall be the executive committee. The chairperson and members of the
standing committees shall be appointed by the executive committee and shall
serve for terms of one year commencing July 1st of each year. Committee members
shall be eligible for reappointment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
331.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
